quote: Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Come, gentlemen, I hope we shall drink down all unkindness.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Sometimes too much to drink is barely enough.
name: Mark Twain

quote: New Year's Resolution: To tolerate fools more gladly, provided this does not encourage them to take up more of my time.
name: James Agate

quote: Let our New Year's resolution be this: we will be there for one another as fellow members of humanity, in the finest sense of the word.
name: Goran Persson

quote: Resolution One: I will live for God. Resolution Two: If no one else does, I still will.
name: Jonathan Edwards

quote: All of us every single year, we're a different person. I don't think we're the same person all our lives.
name: Steven Spielberg

quote: I never worry about being driven to drink I just worry about being driven home.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: Character is the ability to carry out a good resolution long after the excitement of the moment has passed.
name: Cavett Robert

quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: If you are young and you drink a great deal it will spoil your health, slow your mind, make you fat - in other words, turn you into an adult.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: If you want an interesting party sometime, combine cocktails and a fresh box of crayons for everyone.
name: Robert Fulghum

quote: Celebrate what you want to see more of.
name: Tom Peters

quote: I have no way of knowing how people really feel, but the vast majority of those I meet couldn't be nicer. Every once in a while someone barks at me. My New Year's resolution is not to bark back.
name: Tucker Carlson

quote: I don't even drink! I can't stand the taste of alcohol. Every New Year's Eve I try one drink and every time it makes me feel sick. So I don't touch booze - I'm always the designated driver.
name: Kim Kardashian

quote: At a dinner party one should eat wisely but not too well, and talk well but not too wisely.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Good parties create a temporary youthfulness.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: I get half a million just to show up at parties. My life is, like, really, really fun.
name: Paris Hilton

quote: If you asked me for my New Year Resolution, it would be to find out who I am.
name: Cyril Cusack

quote: Those who gave thee a body, furnished it with weakness but He who gave thee Soul, armed thee with resolution. Employ it, and thou art wise be wise and thou art happy.
name: Akhenaton

quote: I doubt if you can have a truly wild party without liquor.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: To have the kind of year you want to have, something has to happen that you can't explain why it happened. Something has to happen that you can't coach.
name: Bobby Bowden

quote: Dinner was made for eating, not for talking.
name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: I know. I'm lazy. But I made myself a New Years resolution that I would write myself something really special. Which means I have 'til December, right?
name: Catherine O'Hara

quote: Each age has deemed the new-born year the fittest time for festal cheer.
name: Walter Scott

quote: What is there more kindly than the feeling between host and guest?
name: Aeschylus

quote: A year from now, you're gonna weigh more or less than what you do right now.
name: Phil McGraw

quote: Deep breaths are very helpful at shallow parties.
name: Barbara Walters

quote: To be an ideal guest, stay at home.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: I've had some lovely extraordinary experiences on New Year's Eve.
name: Debbie Harry

quote: Going to a party, for me, is as much a learning experience as, you know, sitting in a lecture.
name: Natalie Portman

quote: Accept what people offer. Drink their milkshakes. Take their love.
name: Wally Lamb

quote: My parents used to throw great New Year's Eve parties. They invited such an eclectic mix of showbiz people. All those cool people were always hanging out at our apartment.
name: Ben Stiller

quote: Strange to see how a good dinner and feasting reconciles everybody.
name: Samuel Pepys

quote: I like to go to parties where I know everyone. How are you going to have fun with people you don't know?
name: Mary-Kate Olsen
